chunks.question: How do I contact AeroSports Scarborough?
chunks.answer: Phone: 289-454-5555 (press 3 for the park). Email: events.scb@aerosportsparks.ca. Address: 45 Milne Ave, Scarborough, ON.

chunks.question: What are the hours for AeroSports Scarborough?
chunks.answer: Sun-Thur: 10am-8pm. Fri-Sat: 10am-10pm.

chunks.question: How much does it cost to jump at AeroSports Scarborough?
chunks.answer:
Open Jump (Ages 6+): Premium $19.90 (90 min) | VIP $29.90 (120 min)
Open Jump (Ages 2+): Premium $24.90 (90 min) | VIP $29.90 (120 min)
Under 2: FREE with a paying adult.

All prices +tax. AeroSports socks required ($3.99+tax, reusable).

chunks.question: How much are AeroSports socks?
chunks.answer: AeroSports socks are $3.99+tax. Required for ALL jumpers. They are reusable — keep them for future visits!

chunks.question: How much does go karting cost at AeroSports Scarborough?
chunks.answer:
Main Track: Standalone $19.90 | Add-on $9.90 (min height: 54" driver, 36" passenger for dual kart)
Mini Track: Standalone $9.90 | Add-on $4.90 (min height: 36", kids 3+)

No advance booking — first come, first served. Closed-toed shoes required on track.

chunks.question: When is Glow Night at AeroSports Scarborough?
chunks.answer: Scarborough has glow in the dark at ALL times! The main arena features laser lights and LED lights. No special schedule needed — enjoy the glow experience during any visit.

chunks.question: When is Toddler Time at AeroSports Scarborough?
chunks.answer: Saturday mornings, 9AM-10AM. $15.90 (Ages 0-5 only). Includes 1x FREE admission for a parent. Dedicated session for young children.

chunks.question: Do you offer special needs pricing at AeroSports Scarborough?
chunks.answer: Special Needs Pass: $19.90 for 120 minutes of play (no races included). 1 support worker included (waiver required). Valid Access 2 Card must be presented at check-in.

chunks.question: What birthday party packages are available at AeroSports Scarborough?
chunks.answer:
Premium Party (min 10 jumpers): $39.90/jumper — 75 min courts + 45 min room. Pizza + juice box. FREE 60-min pass for GOH, add-on passes for all.

VIP Party (min 10 jumpers): $44.90/jumper — 90 min courts + 60 min room. Pizza + juice box + water bottle. 50% off socks. FREE passes + glow shirt.

Ultimate Party (min 10 jumpers): $59.90/jumper — 120 min courts + 60 min room. Pizza + drinks + water. FREE socks, 1x go kart/jumper, 30-day pass for GOH, $50 outside food fee waived.

All prices +tax. 25% deposit required.

chunks.question: What add-ons are available for birthday parties at AeroSports Scarborough?
chunks.answer: Large Pizza: $25 | Juice Boxes (10): $30 | Soft Drinks (10 cans): $20 | Physical Invitations: $0.75/each | Outside Food Fee: $50 | Go Kart Race add-on: $9.90 | Late ordering fee (within 24hrs): $20

chunks.question: What are the birthday party terms and conditions at AeroSports Scarborough?
chunks.answer: Reschedule within 1 year, no charge. Cancel 14+ days out: store gift card. Cancel within 14 days: no refund. Package changes: 14+ days advance, subject to availability. Waivers required for all. Under 18: parent/guardian signs. Room includes plates/cups/tablecloths. Jumping area shared; room is private. No piñatas/confetti/silly string ($40 charge). Arrive 20 min early.

chunks.question: How much does a group booking cost at AeroSports Scarborough?
chunks.answer: Min 15 jumpers. 120 min: $25.47/jumper (25% off $33.89). Use code GROUPBOOKING25. Same pricing weekdays & weekends. Includes jump time + socks. 1x go kart race per jumper included. 25% deposit required.

chunks.question: How much does a facility rental cost at AeroSports Scarborough?
chunks.answer: 60 min: Weekday $2,000 | Weekend $3,000. Up to 220 jumpers. Includes socks, all rooms, tablecloths, cutlery, unlimited go karting. Food/catering at additional cost.

chunks.question: Can I rent a room at AeroSports Scarborough?
chunks.answer: Party Room (1-4): $100/45 min, 25-30 capacity. Birds Eye Party Arena: $200/45 min, 80 capacity. Rooms not included with group events — rent separately.

chunks.question: What is Aero Camp at AeroSports Scarborough and how much does it cost?
chunks.answer:
PA Day: $69.90 full day (8:30AM-4:30PM).
Summer/Winter/March Break: Full Day $69.90 | Full Week $299.90 | Half Day $39.90 | Half Day Week $169.90.
Half Day AM: 8:30AM-12:30PM. Half Day PM: 12:30PM-4:30PM (summer only).

Add-ons/day: Lunch Combo $9.90, Early Drop Off $10, Late Pick Up $10.
Ages 4-12. Supervised by trained staff. Activities: trampoline, games, crafts, contests.

chunks.question: What passes are available at AeroSports Scarborough?
chunks.answer:
All Day Pass: $39.90 (valid same day) | 30 Day Pass: $49.90+tax (60 min/visit) | 90 Day Pass: $149.90+tax (60 min/visit) | Annual Pass: $364.90+tax (60 min/visit).

Jump cards never expire and can be used by different jumpers. Socks ($3.99) required separately.

chunks.question: Are AeroSports jump socks required?
chunks.answer: Yes, $3.99+tax. Required for all jumpers. Reusable!

chunks.question: Is there a weight limit?
chunks.answer: 300-pound weight limit.

chunks.question: Are waivers required?
chunks.answer: Yes, for everyone including non-jumpers. Complete online to speed up check-in. Under 18: parent/guardian signs.

chunks.question: Can I leave my child unattended?
chunks.answer: Under 12 cannot be dropped off without an adult.

chunks.question: Do spectators have to pay?
chunks.answer: No, non-jumpers are never charged admission.

chunks.question: Do you have food available?
chunks.answer: Yes! Fully stocked Snack Shack.

chunks.question: What days are least busy?
chunks.answer: Mondays and Tuesdays. Weekends are busiest.

chunks.question: Can small children come?
chunks.answer: As long as they can walk, they can jump!

chunks.question: Do you sell gift cards?
chunks.answer: Yes! In-park or online.

chunks.question: Do jump cards expire?
chunks.answer: No, never expire. Usable by different jumpers.

chunks.question: When are refunds processed?
chunks.answer: 3-5 business days.

chunks.question: Do you have single and dual karts?
chunks.answer: Yes! Mini track for kids 3+, big track with single and dual rider karts.

chunks.question: What's the minimum height for go karting?
chunks.answer: Mini: 36". Main (driver): 54". Dual (passenger): 36".

chunks.question: Do I need a jump pass for go karting?
chunks.answer: No, buy standalone races.

chunks.question: Do both driver and passenger need a race pass?
chunks.answer: Yes, everyone participating needs a valid race pass.

chunks.question: Are socks required for go karting?
chunks.answer: Closed-toed shoes on track. Socks for all other attractions.

chunks.question: Can I book a specific time for go karting?
chunks.answer: No. First come, first served. Check in on arrival.

chunks.question: What is Glow?
chunks.answer: Scarborough has glow in the dark at ALL times — laser lights and LED lights in the main arena.

chunks.question: How do I book a group event?
chunks.answer: Book online or by phone. 25% deposit required.

chunks.question: Is a jumpers list required?
chunks.answer: Yes, two weeks before. Helps pre-check waivers.

chunks.question: Is pricing same weekdays and weekends?
chunks.answer: Group jump pricing: same. Facility rental: different.

chunks.question: What's included in group jump?
chunks.answer: Jump time + socks. Add-ons available.

chunks.question: Minimum jumpers for group?
chunks.answer: 15 jumpers.

chunks.question: Are rooms included with groups?
chunks.answer: No, rent separately.

chunks.question: What's in facility rental?
chunks.answer: Socks, exclusive access (220 jumpers), all rooms, cutlery, unlimited go karting.

chunks.question: How to prepare for group event?
chunks.answer: Pay deposit, submit jumpers list 2 weeks early, ensure waivers signed.

chunks.question: Group cancellation policy?
chunks.answer: Deposits non-refundable. Rescheduling may be available.

chunks.question: Food and catering for groups?
chunks.answer: Yes, at additional cost.

chunks.question: Discount code for groups?
chunks.answer: GROUPBOOKING25 — 25% off for 15+ jumpers.

chunks.question: Go karting in group bookings?
chunks.answer: 1x race/jumper for group bookings. Unlimited for facility rentals.

chunks.question: How early should guests arrive?
chunks.answer: 20 minutes before scheduled jump time.

chunks.question: Are socks included in party?
chunks.answer: Varies: Premium no, VIP 50% off, Ultimate FREE.

chunks.question: Can I add extra jumpers?
chunks.answer: Yes, at per-jumper price. Don't exceed room capacity.

chunks.question: Forgot to pre-order add-ons?
chunks.answer: $20 late fee for orders within 24 hours.

chunks.question: Attractions exclusive to party?
chunks.answer: No, shared. Party room is private.

chunks.question: Can I extend time?
chunks.answer: May be available for purchase. Ask when booking.

chunks.question: What if guests don't show?
chunks.answer: Minimum still charged. Extra arrivals: additional fees.

chunks.question: Request specific room?
chunks.answer: We try but can't guarantee — based on availability.

chunks.question: Area for parents to wait?
chunks.answer: Yes, viewing area and common spaces.

chunks.question: Can I bring decorations?
chunks.answer: Yes, no confetti/piñatas/silly string. $40 charge if used.

chunks.question: Check-in process for parties?
chunks.answer: Staff assists. Complete waivers beforehand. Wristbands provided.

chunks.question: Dietary restrictions?
chunks.answer: Accommodated with advance notice.

chunks.question: Party runs late?
chunks.answer: Must follow schedule. Overages may incur fees.

chunks.question: Birthday child in jumper count?
chunks.answer: Yes, counts toward minimum.

chunks.question: Invitations provided?
chunks.answer: Digital included. Physical: $0.75/each.

chunks.question: Themed props/costumes?
chunks.answer: Yes, if safe for jumping.

chunks.question: What if child gets injured?
chunks.answer: Trained staff on-site. Parents notified immediately.

chunks.question: Tour facility before booking?
chunks.answer: Yes! Contact us to arrange.

chunks.question: Split party cost?
chunks.answer: Yes, let us know in advance.

chunks.question: Help with setup/cleanup?
chunks.answer: Yes, staff handles both.

chunks.question: Options for non-jumpers?
chunks.answer: Party room + food. No attractions. Don't count toward minimum.

chunks.question: Book for twins/multiple kids?
chunks.answer: Yes! Let us know to customize.

chunks.question: Cancellation/rescheduling policy?
chunks.answer: Reschedule within 1 year free. Cancel 14+ days: gift card. Within 14 days: no refund.

chunks.question: Upgrade/downgrade package?
chunks.answer: 14+ days advance, subject to availability.

chunks.question: Rewards for multiple parties?
chunks.answer: Contact us about repeat booking discounts.

chunks.question: What's included in Aero Camp?
chunks.answer: Supervised trampolining, games, crafts, contests, group activities.

chunks.question: Book individual days or full week?
chunks.answer: Both options available.

chunks.question: Lunch included?
chunks.answer: No, add Lunch Combo for $9.90/day or send packed lunch.

chunks.question: How to register?
chunks.answer: Online or call. Register early — spots fill up.

chunks.question: What to bring?
chunks.answer: Activewear, packed lunch (if no combo), water bottle.

chunks.question: Supervision during camp?
chunks.answer: Yes, trained staff at all times.

chunks.question: Last-minute early drop-off/late pickup?
chunks.answer: Usually possible. Notify ASAP.

chunks.question: Age requirement?
chunks.answer: 4-12 years old.

chunks.question: Waivers for camp?
chunks.answer: Required. Complete online or at park.

chunks.question: PA Day Camp schedule?
chunks.answer: All PA days per school boards. Check website.

chunks.question: Summer Camp schedule?
chunks.answer: Specific summer weeks. Dates announced closer to start.

chunks.question: March Break Camp?
chunks.answer: During official March Break.

chunks.question: Winter Camp?
chunks.answer: During winter holidays. Dates posted closer to season.

chunks.question: Parents stay during camp?
chunks.answer: Drop-off encouraged. Let us know if child needs settling in.

chunks.question: Extended hours structured?
chunks.answer: Supervised free play. Early from 7:30AM. Late past 6PM.

chunks.question: Lost and found?
chunks.answer: Yes. Label all items.

chunks.question: Electronics allowed?
chunks.answer: Leave at home recommended.

chunks.question: Rest periods?
chunks.answer: Yes, breaks for rest/snacks/lunch. Quiet activities offered.

chunks.question: Child feels unwell?
chunks.answer: Parents notified immediately. First-aid trained staff on-site.

chunks.question: Behavioral issues?
chunks.answer: Staff handles calmly. Parents informed if needed.

chunks.question: Lunch combo contents?
chunks.answer: Pizza, drink, and snack.

chunks.question: Join if miss first day?
chunks.answer: Yes, if space available.
